CreateDatabase.title: CreateDatabase
CreateDatabase.summary: You can call this operation to create a database in a tenant.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: You can call this operation to create an OceanBase cluster.

CreateOmsMysqlDataSource.summary: You can call this operation to create a MySQL data source.

CreateOmsOpenAPIProject.title: CreateOmsOpenAPIProject
CreateOmsOpenAPIProject.summary: You can call this operation to create a data synchronization project.

CreateSecurityIpGroup.title: CreateSecurityIpGroup
CreateSecurityIpGroup.summary: You can call this operation to create an IP address whitelist group.

CreateTenant.title: CreateTenant
CreateTenant.summary: You can call this operation to create a tenant.

CreateTenantReadOnlyConnection.title: CreateTenantReadOnlyConnection
CreateTenantReadOnlyConnection.summary: You can call this operation to create a read-only address for a specified tenant.

CreateTenantSecurityIpGroup.title: CreateTenantSecurityIpGroup
CreateTenantSecurityIpGroup.summary: You can call this operation to create the security whitelist for the tenant.

CreateTenantUser.title: CreateTenantUser
CreateTenantUser.summary: You can call this operation to create an account in a tenant that has access to a database.

DeleteDatabases.title: DeleteDatabases
DeleteDatabases.summary: You can call this operation to delete one or more tenants from an OceanBase cluster.

DeleteInstances.title: DeleteInstances
DeleteInstances.summary: You can call this operation to release an OceanBase cluster.

DeleteSecurityIpGroup.title: DeleteSecurityIpGroup
DeleteSecurityIpGroup.summary: You can call this operation to delete an IP address whitelist group of an OceanBase cluster.

DeleteTenantSecurityIpGroup.title: DeleteTenantSecurityIpGroup
DeleteTenantSecurityIpGroup.summary: You can call this operation to delete the information on the whitelist group of the tenant.

DeleteTenantUsers.title: DeleteTenantUsers
DeleteTenantUsers.summary: You can call this operation to delete one or more database accounts.

DeleteTenants.title: DeleteTenants
DeleteTenants.summary: You can call this operation to delete one or more tenants from an OceanBase cluster.

DescribeAnomalySQLList.title: DescribeAnomalySQLList
DescribeAnomalySQLList.summary: You can call this operation to obtain the list of SQL statements that may have performance problems according to the diagnostic system.

DescribeAvailableCpuResource.title: DescribeAvailableCpuResource
DescribeAvailableCpuResource.summary: You can call this operation to query the CPU resources available for a tenant.

DescribeAvailableMemResource.title: DescribeAvailableMemResource
DescribeAvailableMemResource.summary: You can call this operation to query the available memory resource of an OceanBase Database tenant.

DescribeCharset.title: DescribeCharset
DescribeCharset.summary: You can call this operation to query the character set of an OceanBase Database tenant.

DescribeDatabases.title: DescribeDatabases
DescribeDatabases.summary: You can call this operation to query databases in a tenant.

DescribeInstance.title: DescribeInstance
DescribeInstance.summary: You can call this operation to query the detailed information of an OceanBase cluster.

DescribeInstanceCreatableZone.title: DescribeInstanceCreatableZone
DescribeInstanceCreatableZone.summary: You can call this operation to query the zones of a cluster that can be set as the primary zone.

DescribeInstanceTags.title: DescribeInstanceTags
DescribeInstanceTags.summary: You can call this operation to view the tag value of a cluster.

DescribeInstanceTenantModes.title: DescribeInstanceTenantModes
DescribeInstanceTenantModes.summary: You can call this operation to query the modes of tenants.

DescribeInstanceTopology.title: DescribeInstanceTopology
DescribeInstanceTopology.summary: You can call this operation to query the topology of an OceanBase cluster.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: You can call this operation to obtain the list of OceanBase clusters.

DescribeNodeMetrics.title: DescribeNodeMetrics
DescribeNodeMetrics.summary: You can call this operation to query the detailed metrics information of an OceanBase Database node.

DescribeOasAnomalySQLList.title: DescribeOasAnomalySQLList
DescribeOasAnomalySQLList.summary: You can call this API to view the list of SQL statements that are identified as having performance issues by the diagnostic system.

DescribeOasSQLDetails.title: DescribeOasSQLDetails
DescribeOasSQLDetails.summary: You can call this API to query detailed information about the SQL, including the SQL text, related table names, and so on.

DescribeOasSQLHistoryList.title: DescribeOasSQLHistoryList
DescribeOasSQLHistoryList.summary: You can call this API to view the SQL execution history.

DescribeOasSQLPlans.title: DescribeOasSQLPlans
DescribeOasSQLPlans.summary: You can call this API to retrieve information about the SQL execution plan stored in the diagnostic system based on the SQL ID.

DescribeOasSlowSQLList.title: DescribeOasSlowSQLList
DescribeOasSlowSQLList.summary: You can call this API to view a list of slow queries.

DescribeOasTopSQLList.title: DescribeOasTopSQLList
DescribeOasTopSQLList.summary: You can call this API to retrieve the list of data on the SQL execution performance collected by the diagnostic system.

DescribeOutlineBinding.title: DescribeOutlineBinding
DescribeOutlineBinding.summary: You can call this operation to query the outline binding information or throttling information of an SQL statement in the database based on an SQLID.

DescribeParameters.title: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.summary: You can call this operation to query the information of cluster or tenant parameters.

DescribeParametersHistory.title: DescribeParametersHistory
DescribeParametersHistory.summary: You can call this operation to query the modification history of cluster or tenant parameters.

DescribeRecommendIndex.title: DescribeRecommendIndex
DescribeRecommendIndex.summary: You can call this operation to query the index recommended by the diagnostic system based on an SQL ID.

DescribeSQLDetails.title: DescribeSQLDetails
DescribeSQLDetails.summary: You can call this operation to query the SQL text of an SQL statement based on the SQL ID.

DescribeSQLHistoryList.title: DescribeSQLHistoryList
DescribeSQLHistoryList.summary: You can call this operation to query the execution history of an SQL statement in a specified period based on an SQL ID.

DescribeSQLPlans.title: DescribeSQLPlans
DescribeSQLPlans.summary: You can call this operation to query the information about the SQL execution plans stored in the diagnostic system based on an SQL ID.

DescribeSQLSamples.title: DescribeSQLSamples
DescribeSQLSamples.summary: You can call this API to view the sample data of the execution details of the slow queries.

DescribeSecurityIpGroups.title: DescribeSecurityIpGroups
DescribeSecurityIpGroups.summary: You can call this operation to view the list of IP address whitelist groups.

DescribeSlowSQLHistoryList.title: DescribeSlowSQLHistoryList
DescribeSlowSQLHistoryList.summary: You can call this operation to query the execution history of an SQL statement by SQL ID that is determined as a slow SQL statement during a specified period of time.

DescribeSlowSQLList.title: DescribeSlowSQLList
DescribeSlowSQLList.summary: You can call this operation to query the list of slow SQL statements

DescribeTenant.title: DescribeTenant
DescribeTenant.summary: You can call this operation to query the information of a specific tenant in a specific cluster.

DescribeTenantMetrics.title: DescribeTenantMetrics
DescribeTenantMetrics.summary: You can call this operation to query the metrics of a specified OceanBase Database tenant.

DescribeTenantSecurityIpGroups.title: DescribeTenantSecurityIpGroups
DescribeTenantSecurityIpGroups.summary: You can call this operation to view the list of whitelist groups of the tenant.

DescribeTenantTags.title: DescribeTenantTags
DescribeTenantTags.summary: You can call this operation to view tenant tags.

DescribeTenantUserRoles.title: DescribeTenantUserRoles
DescribeTenantUserRoles.summary: You can call this operation to obtain the account authorization information of the tenant.

DescribeTenantUsers.title: DescribeTenantUsers
DescribeTenantUsers.summary: You can call this operation to query all accounts in a tenant that have access to the database.

DescribeTenantZonesRead.title: DescribeTenantZonesRead
DescribeTenantZonesRead.summary: You can call this operation to query the information about read-only zones of a tenant.

DescribeTenants.title: DescribeTenants
DescribeTenants.summary: You can call this operation to query the tenants in an OceanBase cluster.

DescribeTimeZones.title: DescribeTimeZones
DescribeTimeZones.summary: You can call this API to query the time zones supported by an OceanBase Database tenant.

DescribeTopSQLList.title: DescribeTopSQLList
DescribeTopSQLList.summary: You can call this operation to query SQL execution performance data collected by the diagnostic system.

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: You can call this operation to learn of zones where a cluster can be created in an Alibaba Cloud region.

KillProcessList.title: KillProcessList
KillProcessList.summary: You can call this operation to close a session.

ModifyDatabaseDescription.title: ModifyDatabaseDescription
ModifyDatabaseDescription.summary: You can call this operation to modify the description of an OceanBase database.

ModifyDatabaseUserRoles.title: ModifyDatabaseUserRoles
ModifyDatabaseUserRoles.summary: You can call this operation to modify the privileges of an account on a database.

ModifyInstanceName.title: ModifyInstanceName
ModifyInstanceName.summary: You can call this operation to change the name of an OceanBase cluster.

ModifyInstanceTags.title: ModifyInstanceTags
ModifyInstanceTags.summary: You can call this operation to modify the value of the cluster tags.

ModifyInstanceTemporaryCapacity.title: ModifyInstanceTemporaryCapacity
ModifyInstanceTemporaryCapacity.summary: You can call this operation to modify the temporary capacity of the OceanBase cluster.

ModifyParameters.title: ModifyParameters
ModifyParameters.summary: You can call this operation to modify the parameters of a cluster or tenant.

ModifySecurityIps.title: ModifySecurityIps
ModifySecurityIps.summary: You can call this operation to modify the IP address list in a group.

ModifyTenantPrimaryZone.title: ModifyTenantPrimaryZone
ModifyTenantPrimaryZone.summary: You can call this operation to switch the primary zone of the tenant.

ModifyTenantResource.title: ModifyTenantResource
ModifyTenantResource.summary: You can call this operation to modify the specifications of a tenant in an OceanBase cluster.

ModifyTenantSecurityIpGroup.title: ModifyTenantSecurityIpGroup
ModifyTenantSecurityIpGroup.summary: You can call this operation to modify the information on the whitelist group of the tenant.

ModifyTenantTags.title: ModifyTenantTags
ModifyTenantTags.summary: You can call this operation to modify tenant tags.

ModifyTenantUserDescription.title: ModifyTenantUserDescription
ModifyTenantUserDescription.summary: You can call this operation to modify the description of a specified account in a tenant.

ModifyTenantUserPassword.title: ModifyTenantUserPassword
ModifyTenantUserPassword.summary: You can call this operation to change the logon password of a specified account in a tenant.

ModifyTenantUserRoles.title: ModifyTenantUserRoles
ModifyTenantUserRoles.summary: You can call this operation to modify the database privileges of a specified account in a tenant.

ModifyTenantUserStatus.title: ModifyTenantUserStatus
ModifyTenantUserStatus.summary: You can call this operation to lock or unlock a specified database account.

ReleaseOmsOpenAPIProject.title: ReleaseOmsOpenAPIProject
ReleaseOmsOpenAPIProject.summary: You can call this operation to release a data synchronization project.

ResetOmsOpenAPIProject.title: ResetOmsOpenAPIProject
ResetOmsOpenAPIProject.summary: You can call this operation to reset a data synchronization project.

ResumeOmsOpenAPIProject.title: ResumeOmsOpenAPIProject
ResumeOmsOpenAPIProject.summary: You can call this operation to resume a data synchronization project.

SwitchoverInstance.title: SwitchoverInstance
SwitchoverInstance.summary: You can call this operation to switch between the primary and standby instances of OceanBase.
